home.title: Home page
home.text2: <0>PENZION Kamélie</0> is a newly opened guesthouse with accommodation in Česká Kamenice with accommodation capacity (1 x 2-bedded) one double room, (1 x 4-bedded +2) one four-bedded room with extra bed for two persons.
home.text3: <0>PENZION Kamélie</0> offers accommodation 100 m from the square in a quiet and pleasant environment, in the large garden of the Kamélie gardening. Our guest house is more than just a place to sleep and move on, you will feel at home with us.
home.text4: Visit our PENZION KAMÉLIE, we will be happy to welcome you.

footer.text: We invite you for year-round wanderings through the nature of Českokamenice, visit a part of the newly reconstructed Brothers' Altars under Jehla.
